verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, Thou and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> and thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> with thee shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>: and thou and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> with thee shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of your <S%H3550>priesthood<s%>.

And thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> also of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H7126>bring<s%> thou with thee, that they may be <S%H3867>joined<s%> unto thee, and <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto thee: but thou and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> with thee shall minister <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H5715>witness<s%>.

And they shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H4931>charge<s%>, and the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of all the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>: only they shall not come <S%H7126>nigh<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, that neither they, nor ye also, <S%H4191>die<s%>.

And they shall be <S%H3867>joined<s%> unto thee, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, for all the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>: and a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> shall not come <S%H7126>nigh<s%> unto you.

And ye shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, and the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: that there be no <S%H7110>wrath<s%> any more upon the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And I, behold, I have <S%H3947>taken<s%> your <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: to you they are <S%H5414>given<s%> as a <S%H4979>gift<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.

Therefore thou and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> with thee shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> your priest's <S%H3550>office<s%> for every <S%H1697>thing<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H1004>within<s%> the <S%H6532>vail<s%>; and ye shall <S%H5647>serve<s%>: I have <S%H5414>given<s%> your priest's <S%H3550>office<s%> unto you as a <S%H5656>service<s%> of <S%H4979>gift<s%>: and the <S%H2114>stranger<s%> that cometh <S%H7131>nigh<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, Behold, I also have <S%H5414>given<s%> thee the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of mine heave <S%H8641>offerings<s%> of all the hallowed <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; unto thee have I <S%H5414>given<s%> them by reason of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%>, and to thy <S%H1121>sons<s%>, by an <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

This shall be thine of the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, reserved from the <S%H784>fire<s%>: every <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of theirs, every meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> of theirs, and every sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> of theirs, and every trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> of theirs, which they shall <S%H7725>render<s%> unto me, shall be <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> for thee and for thy <S%H1121>sons<s%>.
In the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> place shalt thou <S%H398>eat<s%> it; every <S%H2145>male<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it: it shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto thee.

And this is thine; the heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of their <S%H4976>gift<s%>, with all the wave <S%H8573>offerings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them unto thee, and to thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> and to thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with thee, by a <S%H2706>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: every one that is <S%H2889>clean<s%> in thy <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of it.

All the <S%H2459>best<s%> of the <S%H3323>oil<s%>, and all the <S%H2459>best<s%> of the <S%H8492>wine<s%>, and of the <S%H1715>wheat<s%>, the <S%H7225>firstfruits<s%> of them which they shall <S%H5414>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, them have I <S%H5414>given<s%> thee.

And whatsoever is first <S%H1061>ripe<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, which they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, shall be thine; every one that is <S%H2889>clean<s%> in thine <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of it.
Every thing <S%H2764>devoted<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be thine.

Every thing that <S%H6363>openeth<s%> the <S%H7358>matrix<s%> in all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, which they <S%H7126>bring<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, whether it be of <S%H120>men<s%> or <S%H929>beasts<s%>, shall be thine: nevertheless the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> shalt thou <S%H6299>surely<s%> <S%H6299>redeem<s%>, and the <S%H1060>firstling<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>beasts<s%> shalt thou <S%H6299>redeem<s%>.

And those that are to be <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> shalt thou <S%H6299>redeem<s%>, according to thine <S%H6187>estimation<s%>, for the <S%H3701>money<s%> of <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>, after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, which is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs<s%>.

But the <S%H1060>firstling<s%> of a <S%H7794>cow<s%>, or the <S%H1060>firstling<s%> of a <S%H3775>sheep<s%>, or the <S%H1060>firstling<s%> of a <S%H5795>goat<s%>, thou shalt not <S%H6299>redeem<s%>; they are <S%H6944>holy<s%>: thou shalt <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and shalt <S%H6999>burn<s%> their <S%H2459>fat<s%> for an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savour<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
And the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of them shall be thine, as the <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H2373>breast<s%> and as the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder<s%> are thine.

All the heave <S%H8641>offerings<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7311>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, have I <S%H5414>given<s%> thee, and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with thee, by a <S%H2706>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: it is a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H4417>salt<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto thee and to thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> with thee.

¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, Thou shalt have no <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> in their <S%H776>land<s%>, neither shalt thou have any <S%H2506>part<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them: I am thy <S%H2506>part<s%> and thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And, behold, I have <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> all the <S%H4643>tenth<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, <S%H2500>for<s%> their <S%H5656>service<s%> which they <S%H5647>serve<s%>, even the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.

Neither must the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5750>henceforth<s%> come <S%H7126>nigh<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, lest they <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%>, and <S%H4191>die<s%>.

But the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>: it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>, that <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> they <S%H5157>have<s%> no <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

But the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which they <S%H7311>offer<s%> as an heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> to <S%H5159>inherit<s%>: therefore I have <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H8432>Among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> they shall <S%H5157>have<s%> no <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.
¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, When ye <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you from them for your <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, then ye shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> up an heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of it for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, even a <S%H4643>tenth<s%> part of the <S%H4643>tithe<s%>.

And this your heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> shall be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> unto you, as though it were the <S%H1715>corn<s%> of the <S%H1637>threshingfloor<s%>, and as the <S%H4395>fulness<s%> of the <S%H3342>winepress<s%>.

Thus ye also shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> an heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of all your <S%H4643>tithes<s%>, which ye <S%H3947>receive<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> thereof the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>.

Out of all your <S%H4979>gifts<s%> ye shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> every heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, of all the <S%H2459>best<s%> thereof, even the hallowed <S%H4720>part<s%> thereof out of it.

Therefore thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, When ye have <S%H7311>heaved<s%> the <S%H2459>best<s%> thereof from it, then it shall be <S%H2803>counted<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> as the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of the <S%H1637>threshingfloor<s%>, and as the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of the <S%H3342>winepress<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in every <S%H4725>place<s%>, ye and your <S%H1004>households<s%>: for it is your <S%H7939>reward<s%> <S%H2500>for<s%> your <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> no <S%H2399>sin<s%> by reason of it, when ye have <S%H7311>heaved<s%> from it the <S%H2459>best<s%> of it: neither shall ye <S%H2490>pollute<s%> the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, lest ye <S%H4191>die<s%>.
